definition: can/may/able to/to approve/to permit/to suit/(particle used for emphasis) certainly/very

sentences.english: What a precious gift honesty is in the midst of so much dishonesty.
sentences.chinese: 在如此多的欺騙中，誠實時如此的難能可貴。

sentences.english: The resolution and toughness shown in him was valuable.
sentences.chinese: 那表現出的那種堅毅，剛強，是難人可貴的。

sentences.english: At that time, because they dare to emancipate the mind, is very valuable.
sentences.chinese: 因爲當時他們敢於解放思想，也是非常難能可貴的。

sentences.english: Among the functions of propriety, the most valuable is that it establishes harmony.
sentences.chinese: 禮的作用就是，待人處事以和諧爲最可貴。

sentences.english: Innocence are the most valuable things in the human world, we rectifiable is it.
sentences.chinese: 純真是人世間最可貴的東西，我們可求的就是它。

sentences.english: The successful launch was a testament to the value of perseverance.
sentences.chinese: 這次成功的發射證明了堅持不懈是多麼可貴。

sentences.english: Health his not valued till sickness comes.
He is an estimable and likeable young fellow .
sentences.chinese: 他是一個難能可貴而又可愛的年輕人。

sentences.english: Her only asset was a gentle nature.
sentences.chinese: 她唯一的可貴之處是溫文爾雅的性情。

sentences.english: A noble and principal personality and spirit of Professor Chen is the pursuance of innovation.
sentences.chinese: 陳老具有一種極爲可貴的開拓創新精神。

sentences.english: Friendship is like sound health, the value of which is seldom known until it is lost.
sentences.chinese: 真正的友誼猶如健康的身體，失去時方知其可貴。

sentences.english: Innocence are the most valuable things in the human world, is it our rectifiable .
sentences.chinese: 純真是人世間最可貴的東西，我們可求的就是它。

sentences.english: Life i value highly, for love, i can give up life, for freedom, i can give up both.
sentences.chinese: 生命誠可貴，愛情價更高，若爲自由身，兩者皆可拋。

sentences.english: Empathy is noble, but it’s not enough.
sentences.chinese: 同情誠可貴，但仍遠遠不夠。

sentences.english: Dreams can also give invaluable information on the status of the body.
sentences.chinese: 夢還可以爲我們供給有關身材狀態的可貴信息。

definition: to place great importance on/to treasure
valuable/precious/to value/to treasure/to set store by
care/solicitude/to show care for/concerned about/attentive to
immediately/at once/at that moment/at the moment
huge/great/grand/worthy of the greatest admiration/important (contribution etc)
not only (this one)/not just (...) but also
